abstract: The Mets name a first-base coach: Tom Goodwin, a former minor league coordinator for the Red Sox.
snippet: The Mets name a first-base coach: Tom Goodwin, a former minor league coordinator for the Red Sox.
lead_paragraph: The Mets continued revamping their coaching staff on Saturday, naming Tom Goodwin their first-base coach. Goodwin, 43, was the minor league outfield and base-running coordinator for the Boston Red Sox for the last three seasons.
